top_categories.workout_context: Walburg Dirty 30's Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills, forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 30 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Walburg Dirty 30's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before December.
When someone attacks on Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills,, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Walburg Dirty 30, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
67ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
30 miles on Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills, burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
At Walburg Dirty 30, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
2-minute all-out efforts on Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills,. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Walburg Dirty 30. Train it until it feels boring.
Varied gradients on Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills, demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Smooth pedaling at 30 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
Long rides with hard efforts mixed in. Simulates what Walburg Dirty 30's Texas Hill Country gravel - rolling hills, actually does to you.

race_overlay.nutrition: Standard hydration and fueling. One bottle per hour minimum. Gel or bar every 45 minutes at race intensity.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Walburg Dirty 30 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on texas hill country gravel - rolling hills, limestone roads, ranch land, technical sections to build confidence.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and VO2max to prepare you for 30 miles of texas hill country gravel - rolling hills, limestone roads, ranch land, technical sections in Walburg, Texas.
